content: अय {%<ab>a.</ab>%} Going, moving. --यः {@--1@} Going, moving (mostly in <ab>comp.</ab>, as in अस्तमय). {@--2@} Good actions of former birth. {@--3@} Good fortune, good luck (शुभावहो विधिः); शुद्धपार्ष्णिरयान्वितः <ls>R. 4. 26.</ls> {@--4@} A move towards the right (in chess). {@--5@} A die or cube (to play with); कलिः सर्वानयानभिभवति <ls>Śat. Br.</ls>
